page.title: 11The A6 Road Milton Ernest
page.content: The{A6 Road}runs from{London to {Manchester}and cuts the village of {Milton Ernest}in two. At the southern end of this village is a disused{Water {Mill,}nearer the centre is{Milton {Ernest Hall}and{Garden Centre}and in the middle of the village is a 16th century public house called{The {Queen's Head}which was formerly a {Coaching Inn.}Following a traffic survey of the A6 we found that during the period 0945h to 1000h on 23.4.1985 this traffic used the road: {Cars 121 {Lorries and vans 60 {Buses 2 {Motor bikes 1 {Bicycles 0 {Others 0 We estimate that 184 X 4 = 736 vehicles pass through{Milton Ernest every hour.
